      margin: 0;

    }

    .header,
    .footer {
      height: 100px;
      line-height: 100px;
      background-color: green;

      font-size: 30px;
      font-weight: bolder;

      background-color: goldenrod;
    }

      padding: 0 220px 0 200px;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .middle,
    .right {
      position: relative;
      float: left;
      min-height: 130px;
      word-break: break-all;
    }

      margin-left: -100%;
      left: -200px;
      width: 200px;
      background-color: red;
    }

    .right {
      margin-left: -220px;
      right: -220px;
      width: 220px;
      background-color: green;
    }

    .middle {
      width: 100%;
      background-color: blue;
    }
  </style>
</head>

      height: 100%;
      background-color: blue;
    }

      margin: 0 220px 0 200px;
      min-height: 130px;

  </style>
